news.title: Met Éireann issues high temperature warning ahead of 30C mini-heatwave
news.summary: Met Éireann has issued a Status Yellow high temperature warning as Ireland is set for sweltering heat over the next four days as well as a mini-heatwave.

news.title: ‘He was one of a kind’ – Donegal father who died after being hit by car in California remembered as ‘an extraordinary man’
news.summary: A Donegal father who died after being struck by a car in California has been remembered as an “extraordinary man”.

news.title: Graduates losing out in Ireland as era of AI replacing jobs begins
news.summary: The AI jobs replacement era in Ireland may have begun, according to a major new report.

news.title: ‘Reluctantly I will not’ – MEP Seán Kelly rules himself out of running for presidency, paving way for Mairead McGuinness as Fine Gael candidate
news.summary: Fine Gael MEP Seán Kelly has ruled himself out of the race to replace Michael D Higgins as president of Ireland.

news.title: Thousands of files ‘deleted’ by ex-director, High Court is told
news.summary: A €13m deal that saw Wicklow-based food truck manufacturing firm Reward Catering bought in 2022 by a Swedish group has erupted into a major High Court feud.

news.title: ‘You did lose the fight’ – Katie Taylor tires of the ‘nonsense’ and shows a snappier side
news.summary: Katie Taylor walked out onto the stage for the official press conference at the Theatre at Madison Square Garden in New York ahead of tomorrow night's third instalment and took her place behind a small podium on which her many belts that have been a life's work were on show.

news.title: ‘Unspeakable tragedy’ – communities in mourning after girl (16) and boy (12) die in separate road accidents
news.summary: North Down has been plunged into mourning after two young people died following separate road collisions in Co Down on Tuesday night.

news.title: Brian and Amy, Angela Scanlon, Laura Whitmore and more: Irish celebrities turn out in style at Wimbledon
news.summary: It’s game, set, match on celebrity spotting at Wimbledon – the Grand Slam tennis tournament is reaching its climax, with the finals taking place this weekend.

news.title: Bel Trew: Another day, another US presidential fallout – Trump takes aim at Putin
news.summary: Another Trump friendship appears to have fallen apart. After the spectacularly public showdown between Donald Trump and his “First Buddy” Elon Musk, this week Trump took aim at former frenemy Vladimir Putin.

news.title: Restaurant review: ‘This ‘cafe in a tent’ is the kind of foodie hotspot any Irish village would be lucky to have’
news.summary: If you’re one of the many people who has long harboured the dream of owning your own cafe or restaurant, this story may make you a little green.
